Posts.Content: Jan 15, 2014 02:58PM mlread13 wrote: hi, this is my first post.  today i had # 11 radiation treatment of 16 after chemo and lumpectomy on one breast..  skin is a little pink but the surprise for me was the pain that came on quite suddenly in my armpit, shoulder, and back of my shoulder. my initial thought was that i had torn a muscle, but after reading more about radiation effects i realized it was more likely pain brought on by the lymph system.  for the past hour i have massaged the whole area gently (small circles with finger tips) and to my relief this gave me some comfort. the area is now less sensitive. i will continue with this self treatment for as long as i have to ~ am just so relieved it worked .
Posts.Title: Winter 2013-2014 Rads TeamKim mouse9587
